name: Prismatic (Tim Mitcheson)
description:
This was made for Yogscast Game Jam 2021

Prismatic is a strategic tower-defence game with a unique twist. Place Light Orbs to paint the world with colour. Overlapping colours merge into a new colour, effecting the enemy in a different way. Come up with the best way to align your orbs to survive as long as possible and protect the Light Crystal from the soldiers of Shadow.

Got a good score? Share it with me on Twitter @timmitcheson

Interesting in seeing more of what I do? Find out at https://timmitcheson.me

Controls

Controls tend to be specific to certain contexts, and there are tooltips available, but generally:

  • Left click- confirm menu choice
  • Right click - cancel/access menu of an orb
  • Scroll wheel - rotate
  • Shift + scroll - rotate faster
  • Ctrl - snap to grid
  • Space - pause game

Tutorial

This tutorial is also available in game:

  • Drag orbs from the left onto the level.
  • Buying/Upgrading costs photons - kill enemies to get them.
  • Rotate/Move to angle their light. Right click orb to access their menu.
  • You can pause any time with SPACE or the pause button.
  • Different coloured areas do different things.
  • White enemies are unharmed by anything but white areas!
  • You lose score the more photons you spend, so spend wisely!
  • Enemy health increases the longer you survive
  • Colours are as follows:
    • Red: Fire, lingering damage
    • Green: Drain enemy health, produces photons
    • Blue: Slows enemies
    • Magenta: Multiplies damage done to affected enemy by 1.25x
    • Yellow: Lightning, damages all previous enemies
    • Cyan: Freezes enemies, then damages them
    • White: Instantly kills the white enemy
    • Stop the enemies of Light from destroying your crystal!
